title: PK – Psi Wheel Control (CW / STOP / CCW)
target_task: Move wheel clockwise, stop it, move it counterclockwise (repeatable control).

setup_controls.airflow_block: Place wheel inside a sealed container (glass/plastic jar, bowl, fish tank) to prevent air currents.
setup_controls.static_control: Ground yourself / reduce static influence (document your method).
setup_controls.camera: Wide shot showing you + wheel + enclosure for later review.

phases.name: Baseline (no intention)
phases.instruction: Hands still. Observe only. Confirm no drift or vibration sources.

phases.name: Distance Set (optional)
phases.instruction: Repeat Control Set A from farther away (across room / another room via webcam) if desired.
